mapper.select: select count(*) from notification where status = 'Y'
select noti_no, noti_content, to_char(noti_enroll_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "noti_enroll_date", noti_enroll_user_no, status from notification where status = 'Y' order by noti_no desc
mapper.insert: insert into notification ( noti_no , noti_content , noti_enroll_date , noti_enroll_user_no ) values ( seq_nno.nextval , #{ notiContent } , sysdate , #{ enrollUserNo } )
mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NO , ROWNUM FROM ( SELECT BOARD_NO , CATEGORY , ROWNUM FROM TB_BOARD WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND CATEGORY = #{ teamCode } ORDER BY MODIFY_DATE DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
